channel.title: Dementhium 639 how to make corp attack with melee?
channel.description: Anyone know? The npc handler doesn't make him attack with melee even though I have set the options, do I need to add it manually or am I doing something wrong?

item.title: Dementhium 639 how to make corp attack with melee?
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

its easy
look go in npcHandler then search for

case 8133: // Corporeal beast if (npcs[i].attackType == 2) return true;

but i think im wrong but look for the other look in that file for other codes like this and find out wich attack type is wich… but yet im not sure its the rigth thing because i havent seen your source and all this is a estimation.

Read full topic
item.source: Dementhium 639 how to make corp attack with melee?
